definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable type="MCItem" id="sample">sample</variable></variables><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="world_switch_world"><field name="dimension">Surface</field><statement name="worldstatements"><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="compare_mcblocks"><value name="a"><block type="blockstate_from_deps"></block></value><value name="b"><block type="mcitem_allblocks"><field name="value">Blocks.BEDROCK</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="variables_set_itemstack"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:sample</field><value name="VAL"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:DeepRockSample</field></block></value><next><block type="play_sound"><field name="sound">CUSTOM:take_sample</field><field name="soundcategory">block</field><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><value name="level"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.8</field></block></value><value name="pitch"><block type="math_random_number_between"><value name="min"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.9</field></block></value><value name="max"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1.1</field></block></value></block></value><next><block type="item_nbt_num_set"><value name="tagName"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">x</field></block></value><value name="item"><block type="variables_get_itemstack"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:sample</field></block></value><value name="tagValue"><block type="custom_dependency_number"><field name="NAME">x</field></block></value><next><block type="item_nbt_num_set"><value name="tagName"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">y</field></block></value><value name="item"><block type="variables_get_itemstack"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:sample</field></block></value><value name="tagValue"><block type="custom_dependency_number"><field name="NAME">y</field></block></value><next><block type="item_nbt_num_set"><value name="tagName"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">z</field></block></value><value name="item"><block type="variables_get_itemstack"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:sample</field></block></value><value name="tagValue"><block type="custom_dependency_number"><field name="NAME">z</field></block></value><next><block type="java_code"><field name="CODE">var biome = MineUtils.getLocalizedBiomeName(new ChunkPos(new BlockPos((int) x, (int) y, (int) z)));</field><next><block type="java_code"><field name="CODE">var result = MineManager.tryCreateMine(new ChunkPos(new BlockPos((int) x, (int) y, (int) z)));</field><next><block type="controls_if"><mutation else="1"></mutation><value name="IF0"><block type="java_code_get"><field name="CODE">result.isEmpty()</field></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="entity_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Жила пуста</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="actbar"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value></block></statement><statement name="ELSE"><block name="actbar"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value><next><block type="entity_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="java_code_get"><field name="CODE">result.get().getType().name()</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="actbar"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value><next><block type="entity_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="java_code_get"><field name="CODE">result.get().getRichness().name()</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="actbar"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></statement><next><block type="item_nbt_text_set"><value name="tagName"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">biome</field></block></value><value name="item"><block type="variables_get_itemstack"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:sample</field></block></value><value name="tagValue"><block type="java_code_get"><field name="CODE">biome.getString()</field></block></value><next><block type="entity_remove_item"><value name="amount"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value
